alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued June 19 at 10:47PM PDT until June 20 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT TUESDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 34 expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Humboldt County. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PDT Tuesday. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight Tuesday night to 9 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
